an4.47:4.1: “Mendicants, these four things are very far apart.
an4.47:4.5: The near and the far shore of the ocean. …
an4.47:4.7: Where the sun rises and where it sets. …
an4.47:4.9: The teaching of the good and the teaching of the bad. …
an4.47:4.11: These are the four things very far apart.”
an4.47:5.1: “The sky is far from the earth;
an4.47:5.2: they say the other shore of the ocean is far;
an4.47:5.3: and where the sun rises is far
an4.47:5.4: from where that shining one sets.
an4.47:5.5: But even further apart than that, they say,
an4.47:5.6: is the teaching of the good from the bad.
an4.47:6.1: The company of the good is reliable;
an4.47:6.2: as long as it remains, it stays the same.
an4.47:6.3: But the company of the bad is fickle,
an4.47:6.4: and so the teaching of the virtuous is far from the wicked.”
